DataElement.preferredName: Stroke Recovery and Recurrence Questionnaire Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A disorder characterized by a sudden loss of sensory function due to an intracranial vascular event._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._To come back or to return._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
